pli-tv-pvr1.2:184.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one sits in an inhabited area with a covered head, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:185.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:185.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one moves about while squatting on one’s heels in an inhabited area, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:186.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:186.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one clasps one’s knees while sitting in an inhabited area, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:187.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:187.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one receives almsfood contemptuously, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:188.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:188.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one receives almsfood while looking here and there, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:189.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:189.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one receives large amounts of bean curry, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:190.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:190.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one receives almsfood in a heap, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:191.1.eng: The third subchapter on hands on hips is finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:192.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:192.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats almsfood contemptuously, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:193.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:193.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats almsfood while looking here and there, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:194.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:194.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats almsfood picking here and there, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:195.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:195.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats large amounts of bean curry, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:196.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:196.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats almsfood after making a heap, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:197.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:197.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one covers one’s curries with rice, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:198.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:198.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats bean curry or rice that, when one is not sick, one has requested for oneself, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:199.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:199.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one looks at the almsbowl of another finding fault, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:200.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:200.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one makes a large mouthful, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:201.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca dīghaṃ ālopaṃ karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:201.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one makes an elongated mouthful, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:202.1.eng: The fourth subchapter on almsfood is finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:203.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivaranto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:203.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one opens one’s mouth without bringing a mouthful to it, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:204.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:204.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one puts one’s whole hand in one’s mouth while eating, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:205.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:205.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one speaks with food in one’s mouth, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:206.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:206.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats from a lifted ball of food, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:207.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:207.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats breaking up mouthfuls, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:208.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:208.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats stuffing one’s cheeks, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:209.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaniddhunakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:209.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats shaking one’s hand, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:210.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sitthāvakārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:210.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats scattering rice, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:211.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca jivhānicchārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:211.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats sticking out one’s tongue, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:212.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca capucapukārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:212.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats making a chomping sound, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:213.1.eng: The fifth subchapter on mouthfuls is finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:214.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:214.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats making a slurping sound, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:215.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:215.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats licking one’s hands, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:216.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:216.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats licking one’s almsbowl, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:217.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:217.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one eats licking one’s lips, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:218.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:218.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one receives the drinking-water vessel with a hand soiled with food, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:219.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:219.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one discards bowl-washing water containing rice in an inhabited area, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:220.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:220.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone holding a sunshade, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:221.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca daṇḍapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:221.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone holding a staff, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:222.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca satthapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:222.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone holding a knife, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:223.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:223.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone holding a weapon, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:224.1.eng: The sixth subchapter on slurping is finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:225.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:225.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone wearing shoes, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:226.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca upāhanāruḷhassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:226.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone wearing sandals, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:227.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca yānagatassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:227.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone in a vehicle, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:228.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:228.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone lying down, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:229.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:229.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone seated clasping their knees, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:230.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca veṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:230.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone with a headdress, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:231.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oguṇṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:231.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone with a covered head, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:232.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:232.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching while sitting on the ground to someone sitting on a seat, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:233.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:233.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching while sitting on a low seat to someone sitting on a high seat, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:234.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:234.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching while standing to someone sitting, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:235.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:235.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching to someone walking in front of oneself, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:236.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:236.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one gives a teaching while walking next to the path to someone walking on the path, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:237.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:237.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one defecates or urinates while standing, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:238.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca harite uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:238.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one defecates, urinates, or spits on cultivated plants, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.1.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.1.eng: When, out of disrespect, one defecates, urinates, or spits in water, how many kinds of offenses does one commit?

pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.2.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.2.eng: When, out of disrespect, one defecates, urinates, or spits in water, one commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.4.pli: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:240.1.eng: The seventh subchapter on shoes is finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:240.2.eng: The rules to be trained in are finished.

pli-tv-pvr1.2:240.3.eng: The number of offenses within each offense, the second, is finished.
